tit.e: Makimuku Yazuka-kofun Tumulus (a tumulus in the Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture)
Makimuku Yazuka-kofun Tumulus (a tumulus in the Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 纒向矢塚古墳（まきむくやづかこふん）は、奈良県桜井市の纒向古墳群に属する古墳。
sen.e: The Makimuku Yazuka Kofun is a kofun (ancient tomb) belonging to the Makimuku Yazuka Kofun Group in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture.
The Makimuku Yazuka-kofun Tumulus is an ancient tomb belonging to the Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 用語を変え、原文に合わせました。
sen.e: The Makimuku Yazuka-kofun Tumulus is an ancient tomb belonging to the Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture.

tit.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 所在地：桜井市東田（ひがいだ）町字矢塚
sen.e: Location: Aza Yazuka, Higaida-cho, Sakurai City
Location: Aza Yazuka, Higaida-cho, Sakurai City
sen.cmt: 半角スペースにしました。
sen.e: Location: Aza Yazuka, Higaida-cho, Sakurai City
Burier; Unknown
Buried person: Unknown
Buried person: Unknown

sen.j: 築造時期：古墳時代前期初頭
sen.e: Time of Construction: Early first half of the Kofun period
Time of Construction: Early first half of the Kofun period (Tumulus period)
Time of Construction: Early first half of the Kofun period (Tumulus period)

sen.j: 墳 形：纒向型前方後円墳
sen.e: Tomb shape: Makimuku type zenpokoenfun (large keyhole-shaped tomb)
Tomb shape: Makimuku type, a large keyhole-shaped mound
Tomb shape: Makimuku type, a large keyhole-shaped mound

sen.j: 規 模：全長約96m、後円部径約64m、後円部高さ5m、周濠幅約17～23m
sen.e: Size: About 96m in full length, the back circular part about 64m in diameter and about 5m in height, the shugo (loop moat) 17 to 23m in width
Size: Approximately 96 meters in full length, the back circular part approximately 64 meters in diameter and 5 meters in height, the shugo (surrounding moat) approximately 17 to 23 meters in width
Size: Approximately 96 meters in full length, the back circular part approximately 64 meters in diameter and 5 meters in height, the shugo (surrounding moat) approximately 17 to 23 meters in width
Buried Spot: Not yet investigated
Buried Spot: Not yet investigated
Buried Spot: Not yet investigated

sen.j: 墳頭部に板石が露出しているので縦穴式石室又は、箱式石棺が考えられる。
sen.e: Flagstones exposed on the top of the tomb suggest that it could be a pit stone chamber or a box type stone coffin.
Flagstones exposed on the top of the tomb suggest that it could be a pit stone chamber or a box type stone coffin.
Flagstones exposed on the top of the tomb suggest that it could be a pit stone chamber or a box type stone coffin.
